Class Payment2Selector

public inherited sharing class Payment2Selector

Runs queries on the Payment2__c object

Changes

06/03/2021 Initial version.
07/11/2021 getPaymentsByIntentIds method: Get payments by PaymentIntentId__c.
07/25/2021 getPayments method: Get payments by Ids.
07/10/2022 getPayments method now returns VenueId__c field.
08/26/2024 countPaymentsByAccount(): Returns the number of unassigned payments by account within a date range.
